title: Login Issue
description: User cannot log in using correct credentials.

title: Page Loading Slowly
description: Dashboard takes too long to load.

title: Error on Checkout
description: An error occurs when trying to complete a purchase.

title: Password Reset Not Working
description: Reset link not being received via email.

title: Mobile App Crash
description: App crashes on launch for Android 13 users.

title: Billing Issue
description: Charged twice for the same invoice.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
description: User requested dark mode support in settings.

title: Data Sync Failure
description: Data not syncing between web and mobile app.

title: Broken Link in Footer
description: The 'Contact Us' link leads to a 404 page.
